buyer_research:
{
  "name": "University of Illinois",
  "website": "https://illinois.edu/",
  "description": "A public land-grant research university in the Champaign–Urbana metropolitan area, Illinois, United States.",
  "industry": "Education",

  "challenges": ["Enhancing student engagement", "Improving faculty productivity", "Streamlining administrative processes", "Ensuring accessibility and equity"],

anticipated_qopcs:
{
  "pains": [
    "How can Whatfix help us enhance student engagement and improve faculty productivity?",
    "Will Whatfix's digital adoption platform be able to integrate with our existing systems and applications?",
    "How can we ensure that Whatfix's solution is accessible and equitable for all our students and staff?",
    "What kind of support and training does Whatfix offer to ensure successful implementation and adoption?",
    "How does Whatfix's pricing model align with our budget and ROI expectations?",
    "What kind of analytics and insights will Whatfix provide to help us measure the effectiveness of their solution?",
    "How can Whatfix help us streamline our administrative processes and reduce costs?",
    "What kind of customization options does Whatfix offer to meet our specific needs and requirements?"
  ],
  "objections": [
    "We are already invested in another digital adoption platform, how does Whatfix differentiate itself?",
    "We are concerned about the complexity of implementing Whatfix's solution, how will it impact our IT resources?",
    "We need a solution that can be implemented quickly, how long will it take to get Whatfix up and running?",
    "We have a limited budget, how does Whatfix's pricing model compare to other solutions in the market?",
    "We are not sure if Whatfix's solution is scalable enough to meet our growing needs and requirements",
    "We have concerns about data security and privacy, how does Whatfix address these issues?"
  ]
}
